Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is slightly grooved, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of five lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393317) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393317)
